amendment.description: To clarify Foreign Service Grievance Board procedures in the case of an alleged overpayment of an annuity.

vote.text: Amendment SA 272 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 272 proposed by Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S3175; text: CR S3175) To clarify Foreign Service Grievance Board procedures in the case of an alleged overpayment of an annuity.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 272 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 272 proposed by Senator Lugar.
